# Raging Swimmer (Ex)
## Overview
*Raging Swimmer (Ex)*: When raging, the barbarian adds her level as an enhancement bonus on all [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] skill checks.

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 33
